name: High School News Letter
description: A new bi-weekly newsletter launched by the Daily Pennsylvanian aimed at helping high schooler stay caught up with opportunities in and around the school and eventually write a strong Why Penn essay!

name: DP Hacks
description: A first of its kind hackathon hosted by the Daily Pennsylvanian which challenges Penn developers to create new products, services, or plans which provide some value to the larger Penn community.
